description:
D360 Bank is a shariah-compliant digital bank that aims to provide the best financial experience in the Kingdom.

Our Vision:

To reinvent finance through innovation & technology making it convenient, accessible & fair to all.
description_enriched: D360 Bank is a banking partner that offers tailored services to meet specific needs. They provide flexible, secure, transparent, fast, and flexible banking solutions.
description_metadata_raw: Discover why D360 Bank is your ideal banking partner with tailored services that revolve around you. Open Your Account Now.

company_locations_full.location_address: PO Box 4352; Charlottesville, Virginia 22905, United States

Where passion finds its home ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¦ğŸ†

At D360 Bank protecting job applicants is our priority.
We would like to warn job applicants about fraudulent accounts impersonating us and offering paid training or recruitment opportunities using high-pressure tactics to prompt quick decisions.
We assure you that all recruitment and training at D360 Bank are entirely free and never require payment.

Here are some tips to stay safe:

â€¢ Verify job opportunities or confirm any information using only official channels:
- The careers page on our website: careers.D360.com
- D360 Bank official Linkedin page.
â€¢ Always check the sender's email address for spelling errors or discrepancies from our official domain: @D360.com.
â€¢ Be cautious before clicking on suspicious links or unexpected attachments.
â€¢ Report any fraudulent attempts immediately via our official email: Fraud-investigation@d360.com

Stay alert and report any suspicious activity!

Al Rajhi Capital's mission is to provide you with high quality investment banking products and services that are tailor-made to meet your particular requirements. In addition, our investments comply with the guidelines of the Al Rajhi Capital Shariah Board. Al Rajhi Capital is based on the solid values and investment experience established by Al Rajhi Bank, a leader in banking products and services. Our staff has a breadth of global expertise and experience to assist clients in fulfilling their investment goals.

Comprehensive investment solutions for corporations, companies and individuals, among which are: Asset Management, Brokerage and Investment Banking, are provided through Al Rajhi Capital.

We, at Al Rajhi Capital work unceasingly to provide our clients with only the finest of investment services.

Al Rajhi Capital has signed a strategic agreement with Alramz Real Estate Company to launch an investment fund worth SAR 1.4 billion, dedicated to developing two towers for service apartments in Masar Destination project in Makkah. This fund further strengthens Al Rajhi Capitalâ€™s portfolio of leading real estate ventures, showing its commitment to delivering innovative investment opportunities that meet investor ambitions and align with evolving market trends.

Al Rajhi Capital has signed an agreement with Marriott International through the â€œAramak â€“ Al Rajhi Capitalâ€ Real Estate Fund to implement the first phase of the integrated Aramak Project in north Riyadh. The fund, valued at SAR 1.4 billion, is the result of a strategic partnership between Al Rajhi Capital and Aramak Real Estate, with the former managing the fund and securing financing, and the latter acting as the projectâ€™s main developer.

This step reflects Al Rajhi Capitalâ€™s commitment to developing high-quality projects and providing promising investment opportunities that reinforce its position as a leading partner in the real estate sector.

Al Rajhi Capital in its capacity as Sole Financial Advisor, Lead Manager, Bookrunner and Underwriter has announced the intention of United Carton Industries Company (UCIC) to proceed with the initial public offering (IPO) and listing of its ordinary shares on the Main Market (Tadawul). The offering shall be comprise of 30% of the share capital of UCIC. The institutional book building period is scheduled from April 22 to April 28, 2025, while the subscription period for retail investors is scheduled from May 12 to May 13, 2025.

For more information: https://lnkd.in/ds-WTEtA

Al Rajhi Capital in its capacity as Sole Financial Advisor, Lead Manager, Bookrunner and Underwriter has announced the intention of United Carton Industries Company (UCIC) to proceed with the initial public offering (IPO) and listing of its ordinary shares on the Main Market (Tadawul). The offering shall be comprise of 30% of the share capital of UCIC. The institutional book building period is scheduled from April 22 to April 28, 2025, while the subscription period for retail investors is scheduled from May 12 to May 13, 2025.

For more information: https://lnkd.in/ds-WTEtA

#AlRajhi_Capital is pleased to announce the appointment of Mr. Hossam Al-Basrawi as the Chief Executive Officer of the company.

Mr. Hossam has an extensive track record in the banking sector spanning over 28 years, during which he has held several leadership positions at various banks. Most recently, he served as the General Manager of Corporate and Private Banking at #AlRajhi_Bank. He is also a board member and serves on executive committees of several companies.

We wish Mr. Hossam success in his new role and look forward to achieving further accomplishments and successes with the Al Rajhi Capital team, a leader in the financial and investment sector.

On the sidelines of the "Nomu" Forum for Financial Sustainability, #alrajhi_capital announced the Al Rajhi Endowment Fund launch. This is an open-ended, multi-asset investment endowment fund allows charitable organizations and non-profit entities to participate. The fund aims to enhance community involvement and contribute effectively to supporting the non-profit sector, thereby helping to achieve its goals and strengthen its financial sustainability in the long term.

As part of its commitment to sustainable development, #alrajhi_capital participated in the "Nomu" Forum for Financial Sustainability, showcasing investment opportunities and innovative solutions to enhance the sustainability of the endowment and non-profit sector. We are proud to be recognized for serving 73 beneficiaries from endowment funds, continuing to reshape a sustainable financial future for the benefit of our community.
